member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Returns an array of all US States

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an array of all cities in the specified state.

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_counties(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an array of all counties in the specified state.

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_counties_X_cities(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an array of all cities in the specified state and county

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities_X_lastname(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a "top-level" GpdNode (GeoPersonDirectory node) for the given city. This node will contain the Top 100 last names in the city, with the NextLetters attribute containing the first letters of all last names not included in the Top 100. Recipient traverse down the directory from the Top 100 last names, use the geo/states/{state_fips:int}/cities/{city_fips:int}/lastname/{lastname}/firstname API. Recipient traverse down from the NextLetters, use the geo/states/{state_fips:int}/cities/{city_fips:int}/lastname/{lastname_starts_with} API.

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities_X_lastname_X(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a GpdNode (GeoPersonDirectory node) for the given city and lastnames that start with the {lastname_starts_with} parameter. The returned node will contain the Top 100 last names in the city that start with {lastname_starts_with}, and the NextLetters will contain the next letters of all the last names not included in the Top 100. Recipient traverse down the directory from the Top 100 last names, use the geo/states/{state_fips:int}/cities/{city_fips:int}/lastname/{lastname}/firstname API. Recipient traverse down from the NextLetters, use this same API, adding a single "next letter" to the {lastname_starts_with} string.
member.param: Starting characters of last name (may be passed as empty string)

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities_X_lastname_X_firstname(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a "top-level" GpdNode (GeoPersonDirectory node) for the given city and specific last name. This node will contain the Top 100 first names in the city with the specified last name, with the NextLetters attribute containing the first letters of all first names not included in the Top 100. Recipient traverse down the directory from the Top 100 first names, use the search/preview API. Recipient traverse down from the NextLetters, use the geo/states/{state_fips:int}/cities/{city_fips:int}/lastname/{lastname}/firstname/{firstname_starts_with} API.

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities_X_lastname_X_firstname_X(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a "top-level" GpdNode (GeoPersonDirectory node) for the given city, specific last name, and first names that start with {firstname_starts_with}. This node will contain the Top 100 first names in the city with the specified last name and starting first name characters. The NextLetters attribute will containh the first letters of all first names not included in the Top 100, given the above criteria. Recipient traverse down the directory from the Top 100 first names, use the search/preview API. Recipient traverse down from the NextLetters, use this same API, adding a single "next letter" to the {firstname_starts_with} string.
member.param: Starting characters of first name (may be passed as empty string)

member.name: M:Aci.X.WebAPI.GeoController._GET_geo_states_X_cities_X_lastname_X_firstname(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the
